Author: GitHub
Description:
Happy 34th birthday to the Linux kernel! From a single release by Linus Torvalds to powering our entire cloud infrastructure and the phones in our pockets, it's an incredible open source journey. Here's to many more years of innovation.

#Linux #LinuxKernel #LinusTorvalds

Title: Happy 34th birthday to the Linux kernel
